reviewText: DON'T BUY THIS VIDEO!!! This video is a complete waste of money and a huge disapointment. They give the buyer the impression that this is a "collection" of rare interveiws from Guns N' Roses but it isn't. It is just one interveiw that lasts approximately 15-20 minutes and then stops suddenly. This same interview along with several others can be seen on the Appetite for Destruction:the interviews dvd for a lot less money! SAVE YOUR MONEY AND DON'T BUY THIS VIDEO!!!!
this dvd is only like 5 or 10 minutes long and it is nothing you probaly haven't already seen on the computer some where
The whole DVD is basically a 18-minutes long footage of a signing session; completely non-edited and non-informative. The picture quality is like of an 80-ies cheap home video camera.
